data.text:
Andy Roddick is an American previous expert tennis player who is most popular for winning the title at the 2003 US Open which made him world no.1 in 2003. He used to contend in singles and in pairs.

He got accepted into the International Tennis Hall of Fame close by Kim Clijsters on 22nd July 2017. He is viewed as outstanding amongst other tennis players of his period alongside Rodger Federer and Raphael Nadal. He likewise held the quickest serve record for a period at 155mph.

Celebrated NameAndy RoddickAge38 YearsNick NameAndy RoddickBirth NameAndrew Stephen RoddickBirth Date1982-08-30GenderMaleProfessionTennis Player

He is additionally dynamic in the web-based media stage with around 1.4 million adherents on Twitter: @andyroddick

Andy Roddick was born on August 30 1982 in Omaha, Nebraska, United States. His original name is Andy Stephen Roddick. He holds an American identity. His identity is White while Virgo is his zodiac sign.

He was born as the most youthful offspring of Jerry Roddick(father) and Blanche Roddick(mother). His dad was a finance manager while her mom was a teacher. He has two more seasoned brothers, Lawrence and John. John is likewise a previous tennis player. He was brought up in Austin, Texas alongside his brothers. Then, at that point, his family moved to Florida for his brotherâs tennis profession.

He did his tutoring from SEK Boca Prep International School and got graduated in 2000. Afterward, he went to the University of Nebraska High School. While in secondary school, he played school b-ball. Roddick began playing tennis for no particular reason with his brothers and later he sought after it as his profession. He was motivated by his brother, John, and previous tennis player, Andre Agassi.

As a lesser, he contended in a large number rivalry. During his lesser tennis profession, in the past he needed to stop tennis because of his losing streak. Be that as it may, his then, at that point mentor, Tarik Benhabiles assisted him with getting over from his choice. In 1999, he completed at No.6 in the US Junior and completed at No.1 in 2000. He additionally won the US Open and Australian Open Junior singles Titles in 2000. As a lesser, he won six singles titles and seven twofold titles.

Andy Roddick began his expert tennis vocation in 2001 by overcoming Fernando Vicente at the ATP level.

In 2002, he crushed then World No.1 âGustavo Kuertenâ in the Miami Masters. He additionally crushed 7-time Wimbledon Champion, Pete Sampras in the third round of the Miami Masters.

He confronted Younes El Aynaoui in the quarterfinals of the 2003 Australian Open. They struggled for the five hours in the fifth set which was the longest fifth set in a Grand Slam Tournament. He got the triumph with the focuses 21-19.

He got crushed by Swiss tennis player, Rodger Federer in the 2003 Wimbledon elimination rounds. Rodgers proceeded to turn into the victor.

Around the same time, he won the Master Series Titles which was his lone Grand Slam title

At 21 years old, Roddick arrived at the pinnacle of his profession by being positioned World no.1 in 2003. He turned into the most youthful and the main American to do as such after his godlike object, Andrei Agassi in 1999.

His rule at No.1 finished after Roger Federer won 2004 Australian Open and he positioned no.1.

In the year 2005, he turned into the first to win the SAP Open in quite a while since Mark Philippoussis in 1999 and 2000.

Subsequent to being positioned lower than no.10 interestingly since 2002, he began to work under his new mentor, tennis legend âJimmy Connorsâ.

At his first Grand Slam finals, he got crushed by his untouched adversary and afterward no. 1, Rodger in 2006.

He arrived at the semi-finals of 2007 Australian Open and was again crushed by Rodger in straight sets. The record between them became for Rodgers with 13-1 successes.

toward the finish of 2007, he had a knee injury and needed to miss numerous different contests.

He confronted Rodger in the Wimbledon Finals 2009 and again got crushed by him. The last between them was recorded as the longest menâs Grand Slam in finals.

In 2010 and 2011, he enjoyed a short reprieve from rivalries because of his shoulder injury.

He won the Aegon International title subsequent to overcoming Andreas Seppi in the finals. Subsequent to winning the title, he turned into the solitary male tennis player other than Roger Federer to have succeeded somewhere around one title each year in the previous 12 years.

Because of his common wounds, he declared his retirement in singles in 2012 with a world position of No. 39.

In the year 2015, he collaborated with Mardy Fish and contended in the 2015 BB&T Atlanta Open where his group lost in the quarterfinals. After the competition, he resigned from the duplicates also.

He finished his expert tennis vocation with 34 titles in singles and 4 titles in pairs.

On 22nd July 2017, Riddick got accepted into the International Tennis Hall of Fame close by Kim Clijsters.

The previous American tennis player, Andy Roddick is hitched once for the duration of his life which was with Brooklyn Decker. Decker is an American entertainer and model who is for the most part known for her appearance in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue. The couple began dating in 2007 and got drawn in on 31st March 2008. The couple at last secured the bunch on seventeenth April 2009 in Astin, Texas.

They are honored with a child, Hank who was born on 30th September 2015, and with a little girl who was born on November 27, 2017. He has additionally facilitated not many shows on Fox Sports Radio and was recruited as the co-have for the organizationâs program âFox Sports Liveâ. He has additionally talked with his better half on the public broadcast in 2012. As of now, he alongside his family is carrying on with a rich way of life and a glad life.

Andy Roddick has very great profit from his expert profession as a previous tennis player. Having begun his vocation since 2000 at 18 years old, he has won 38 titles. With the entirety of his titles for over years, Andy has figured out how to gather a solid fortune in million worth which is assessed to be around $20 million starting at 2020.

The previous expert tennis player, Andy Roddick is a gorgeous man with athletic body build in his 30s. With his faultless hustle game and beguiling character, Ferg has figured out how to win a few hearts from one side of the planet to the other. He stands tall with a stature of 6ft 2inches while his body weighs around 89kg.

He has a reasonable appearance with light hair and earthy colored eyes. His feet size is 12.
